quest.name: Dearest Keiko
journal: The body lying in front of you appears to be gripping something in its hand.
objectives: Use the mauled man's watercolor sketch to search for his former lover.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you choose to undertake this quest, you will receive no guidance from the journal or the duty list. You will need to read the text carefully and decipher the clues to determine your next course of action.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A ravaged corpse lies in front of you. You notice its lifeless left hand contains what appears to be a journal.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The book's jacket has been stained with blood and taken on a crimson hue. Flipping through its pages, you find what seems to be the owner's final entry.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Bloodstained Journal-)Dearest Keiko,
I often wonder if you have come to resent me for leaving you behind.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Bloodstained Journal-)Every moment spent without you by my side causes my heart to grow weaker and weaker. There has been many a time where I almost gave up, abandoned hope. But I knew I could not until the day I fulfilled my promise to you.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Bloodstained Journal-)The fact I now know this day shall never come pains me more than I could ever express using mere words. Luck has carried me back home, but it does not seem it can carry me any further.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Bloodstained Journal-)I would not protest were you to think me a coward. I wanted nothing more than to gaze into those beautiful eyes and tell you just how sorry I am. Tell me, do you still await my return where we swore we would be reunited someday?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You spy a small sketch tucked in between the journal's final page and its cover. It seems to be of the location where the two lovers promised they would be reunited.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Map icons will not be displayed for the duration of this quest. Use the mauled man's sketch to search for his former lover.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: Is there something I can help you with?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Show the watercolor sketch to the dispirited woman?

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: Wh-Where did you find this?

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: It was in the back of a dead man's journal?

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: I am sad to say I am not the woman you are searching for. However, I do know where she is.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: Follow me. I shall take you to meet her.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: My sister rests peacefully beneath this tree nowadays.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: We lost both our parents during the imperial invasion. As I was still but an infant it fell on my sister's young shoulders to raise me.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: And that was far from being her only responsibility. She had to work day and night in order to keep me fed while paying the Empire's extortionate taxes. It was five years ago to the day that she fell ill from the strain and...

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: She continued to wait for her beloved right up until she drew her last breath.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: I heard from my sister that he left Namai as he was a major figure in the rebellion. He knew the Empire would have his head were he to remain here.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: Even knowing this, I was still unable to find it in my heart to forgive him.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: It was only out of respect to my sister's faith in her dearest I decided to visit, from time to time, the area where they said they would meet again.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: Never did I expect things to conclude in this manner.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: I wish to compensate you for taking the trouble to deliver this news to me. Please come see me in the village.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: I have talked with the villagers and it has been agreed that my sister's beloved will be buried next to her. At least they shall be reunited in death...

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: Now that I know how he truly felt, I think I too have it in me to forgive him.

dialogue.name: SISTER02735
dialogue.text: I could not have done so were it not for your help. My sincerest thanks to you, kind stranger.
